title: [1.4.6] 【ssp】传说中的The Herobrine mod !!!
author: muomuo
txt_content:
本帖最后由 muomuo 于 2013-3-9 23:47 编辑 

Him MOD!!!MC中最复杂的生物！他会建造陷阱！会恐吓你！ 安装方法：正版 将下载下来的文件解压找到InstallWindows.bat并打开点install打开游戏，玩吧！
盗版 需要Modloader！！！里面的碟片还需要  Audio mod (非必要)将下载下来的文件解压找到intominecraft.jar 文件夹[attach]91975[/attach] 打开，将里面所有东西拖入入 minecraft.jar找到into.minecraft文件夹打开，将里面所有东西拖入.minecraft 文件夹打开游戏，玩吧！
使用方法： 进入世界按[bone][bone][bone][bone][slow_sand][bone][bone][bone][bone]造一个Him召唤台（上面的一大堆骨头的是带个Him头方块的合成方法）按[fire][bloodstone]him召唤台[gold_block][gold_block]摆放之后就会有him spwan了~\(≧▽≦)/~啦啦啦小心被他吓着
他来找史蒂夫啦（莫非是好基友？）更多精彩，等你来发现
制作人名单 

BlahBlahBlahGAMING for his herobrine songGothtigger92 for her herobrine songpitman-87 for the magicbox support and the codeHalucid for the NotchskinStudnicky for the Chuck skinKoquitlum for making this awesome bannertheshrimpy1 for testing the mod for hours, and correcting 
nthe readme fileKilltherun1 for supporting me and making two good videosGameChap for his awesome video

如果下不了看这里 度娘网盘 特坑爹的安装方法原文----------------HOW TO INSTALL----------------FIRST: Extract the archive1. Run EasyModInstaller.jar2. Select your minecraft.jar3. done!
Note: under linux you have to switch your working dir with cd

---------------------How to Install MANUAL-----------------------!!REQUIRES MODLOADER!!!!For the disc's you will also need audio mod!!
1. Move the files from the intominecraft.jar folder into minecraft.jar (obviously)
2. Copy the Herobrine folder into the .minecraft folder 
3. Open Minecraft, load a world, build a totem, light it, and get ready to shit your pants!最后求金币，求人气，一个一个的码字不容易呀

replies.author: guirulai
replies.txt_content: HIM是史蒂夫的哥哥，他们有一天，哥哥（HIM）采食物，弟弟（史蒂夫）打猎，结果走丢了，哥哥(HIM)采食物的时候被小黑锁定目标，哥哥（HIM）没有死及时防卫了，剑擦伤了皮肤小黑的血洒在了哥哥HIM手上（受伤的那个部位），并且他得到能力也听得懂小黑的话了，哥哥（HIM）丧失记忆，小黑说:"我们要杀死一个叫史蒂夫的人类“小黑也把HIM当做老大。然后史蒂夫各种悲剧
